dmca.title: [ABUSE] DMCA AND REGISTERED TRADEMARK INFRINGMENT
dmca.body:
en -----Original Message----- From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, November 24, 2004 9:16 AM To: John Evans; copyright@theplanet.com Cc: copyright@theplanet.com; legal@gameconsoleskins.com Subject: Re: [ABUSE] DMCA AND REGISTERED TRADEMARK INFRINGMENT -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE----- Hash: SHA1 Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration. - -- Thank you, Policy Enforcement The Planet Internet Services, Inc. http://www.theplanet.com/aup/ John Evans wrote: | Date: 11/22/2004 | | | | From: John Evans | | To: ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries | | Subject: *_DMCA Claim and Registered Trademark infringement_*. | | | | Work(s) infringed: Violation of copyright, violation of US and Canadian | Registered Trademarks TMA619436 and 78304398 respectively. | | | | Source code of site infringed site http://www.gameconsoleskins.com | | | | |

Xbox Skins, Xbox Skin, Console Skins, Console Skin, PS2 Skins, PS2 Skin, Playstation 2 Skins, Playstation 2 skin, modchip, Xbox Skins, Xbox Skin, Console Skins, evox, Console Skin, PS2 Skins, PS2 Skin, Playstation 2, Xbox Skins, X box Skin, Console Skins, Console Skin, PS2 Skins, PS2 Skin, Playstation2 Skins, Playstation2 skin, modchip, evox Skins, Playstation 2 skin, modchip

| | | | Location(s) of materials claimed to infringe upon Copyright and | Trademark(s): http://www.skinefx.com | | | | /The following HTML code is IDENTICAL not only in word order but also in case, clearly copied directly from the original site (www.gameconsoleskins.com). Furthermore the term Console SkinR (Skin) is a Registered Trademark. There are countless other locations throughout this website that not only infringe on copyright but more seriously infringe on the Registered Trademarks, we consider these violations deliberate, flagrant and unlawful./ | | | |

Xbox Skins, Xbox Skin, Console Skins, Console Skin, PS2 Skins, PS2 Skin, Playstation 2 Skins, Playstation 2 skin, modchip, Xbox Skins, Xbox Skin, Console Skins, evox, Console Skin, PS2 Skins, PS2 Skin, Playstation 2, Xbox Skins, X box Skin, Console Skins, Console Skin, PS2 Skins, PS2 Skin, Playstation2 Skins, Playstation2 skin, modchip, evox Skins, Playstation 2 skin, modchip

| | | | | | Date, time, time zone infringement observed: 11/18/2004 11:40AM PST; | 11/21/2004 2:30PM PST, 11/23/04 8:00 PM PST | | | | Complaining party's name, address, phone, fax, Internet e-mail address: | | | | SkinsFoundry Inc. | | 6762 Warner Ave Ste P1 | | Huntington Beach, CA 92647 | | PH: 714-642-6582 | | legal@gameconsoleskins.com | | | | I believe this information is accurate and that I am authorized to act | on behalf of the copyright owner. The use of the material in the manner | complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, the Trademark | owner its agents or the law. *We further demand that access to the | stated materials be permanently removed or that access to such materials | be disabled immediately to avoid further legal actions against the | offending parties and or content providers.* | | | | Respectfully, | | | | J. Evans | | E. Rubenstein Esq. | | | | | | Cc: Law Office 11 | | Cc: File | | | -----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE----- Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32) Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org iD8DBQFBpKW3vK/XpJs6oyURAso1AJwMC9e3jPLVSkGXBASs6AofIlerMACeLXRc Y+vf4AhWX+oNmeW/Op10qMU= =sYst -----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
